title: Worst Gaiden: Zetton-sensei
original_name: WORST 外伝 ゼットン先生
sinopse:
After years of studying, Saburou Hanazawa, AKA Suzuran's legendary Zetton, has finally become a high school teacher. But on his first day at work, the principal tells him he was actually hired not to teach, but to make the students of his homeroom class drop out of school?!

(Source: MU)
